Name: Batho[tel]
About the game: Step into the everchanging, claustrophobic world of Batho[tel]. After losing everything, including your own body, you find yourself walking through a hotel which seems familiar but eerily unwelcoming. Solve puzzles, avoid death, and learn about other guests as you make your way through the repeating world. Puzzles – Solve puzzles to make your way through the hotel, don’t let the other residents discourage you. Guests – Guests will show themselves in different ways, please always be respectful of others using the hotel’s services. Changing world – Don’t lose yourself in the changing world. What you know may be gone forever, but what comes next may be exactly what you’re looking for.
